text: Ni (jwapochele soni toba) kwa aŵala ŵatatu ŵana kulechedwaga (toba jao ngapocheledwa chitema) kwikanila ndema ja chaaŵanile chilambo mwachisapanguchilemu, ni ŵaŵanikwe soni m’mitima mwao, ni ŵasimichisye yanti pangali kwakuntilila Allah ikaŵeje Kukwakwe pe. Kaneka ni jwakombolasyisye ŵanganyao kutenda toba kuti atende tobajo, chisimu Allah ni Jwakupochela nnope toba, Jwachanasa channope
